root.name: Super Robot Wars EX
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of the anime series which are featured in the game. Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)".Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Suit Gundam F91 Mazinger Z Great Mazinger UFO Robo Grendizer Getter Robo G Demon God of War Goshogun (new) Aura Battler Dunbine (new) Banpresto Originals (original characters created for the game) Masoukishin - Lord of Elemental (Banpresto original storyline; new) New FeaturesChapters: The game is split into three chapters, each based on one of the originals from SRW 3: Ryuune, Masaki, and Shuu. The player can choose Ryuune's and Masaki's in any order, while Shuu's story is always last.Interactive Scenarios: After playing one of the aforementioned chapters, the player has the option of carrying the decisions made in that chapter into the next, setting up events that would not happen otherwise. A somewhat similar system is used in the SRW Compact 2 trilogy, in which the player can carry save data containing unlocked characters (among other things) to the next chapter via the Wonderswan's internal memory.Upgradeable Weapons: Weapons can now be upgraded.

similar_games.game: Super Robot Wars Gaiden: Masou Kishin - The Lord of Elemental
